short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merge and split tabs using keyboard shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension to split a tab from a browser window (Alt + Shift + X), or merge a single-tab window into another browser window (Alt + Shift + Z).
